content.question: What can be expected on the cruise?

choices.label: Guests will enjoy a delicious traditional meal.
Guests will receive souvenir photos of an island.
Guests will have illuminated views of a shrine.
Guests will listen to a Japanese musical performance.

content.answer: Guests will have illuminated views of a shrine.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meanings of a text.
